title: Ilgich
description:
Fringe with warp-twined heading, warp-twined bands, Pieced, printed lining.
Dark red wool ground with polychrome silk embroidery. Patterned silk tape edging with red silk fringe border all four sides. The backing is printed cotton fabric (red polka dots). Applied braid with fringe, all four edges. Chain stitch.
creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
